ComicInfo.Title: Hurry Down Doomsday (The Bugs Are Taking Over)
ComicInfo.Summary:
"RISE OF THE VAMPIRES" aftermath!
The new leader of the vampires is ANDREW BENNETT?!
The vampire pilgrimage to their new homeland begins here. Many new characters and stories will be introduced along the way.
General notes: While the credits list Clayton Crain as the cover artist, it was drawn by series artist Andrea Sorrentino
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-20 01:14:40. [CVDB336576] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 00:47:44. [Issue ID 946675]
ComicInfo.Characters: Tig Rafelson,The Van Helsings,John Troughton,Vampires (villains),Mary, Queen of Blood [Mary Seward] (villain),Andrew Bennett
